description: Frictional Lichenoid Dermatitis is a skin condition characterized by inflammation and irritation caused by friction or rubbing of the skin. It typically presents as red, itchy patches or bumps on the affected area.
possible causes: Friction or rubbing of the skin
Sensitivity to certain materials or fabrics
treatments: Avoiding friction or rubbing of the affected area
Moisturizing creams to soothe the skin
